name: Howler Of The Hill
description: A Large Aberration with exceptional features and an eerie howl, capable of inflicting psychic damage and incapacitating foes in varying light conditions.
memorable: Possesses the ability to incapacitate or stun multiple opponents with its howls depending on the light, making it highly dangerous in different environments.
goals: To incapacitate and dominate foes through psychic manipulation while evading physical confrontations.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other psychic aberrations or as a solitary predator in its territory.
environment: Typically found in dark or eerie locales, especially where changing light conditions exist.
strengths: Immunity to psychic damage, adept in both melee and ranged psychic attacks, and highly mobile.
weaknesses: While resistant to physical attacks, it is vulnerable to magical effects that do not target its high saving throws.
attacks: Can unleash a flurry of claw attacks in close combat or strike at a distance with its powerful Psychic Bolt.
most_powerful_ability: Gloaming Howl, which affects the targets based on the light conditions, rendering them incapacitated, stunned, or paralyzed with fear.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, enabling it to perceive enemies hiding from it.
skills: Has a notable passive Perception of 19, allowing it to effectively notice concealed creatures.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, or sleep as a Hungry Void Traveler.
Immunity to effects that sense its emotions or read its thoughts.
Can transport itself to another plane using its Otherworldly Hunter ability.
